short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your friendly go-to wallet for DeFi and NFTs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flint is a friendly go-to wallet for DeFi and NFTs. As a light wallet, Flint allows you to easily manage multiple assets from different chains in your browser. With native support for interoperability standards, Flint provides a smooth experience no matter which platform you need to use.
